1.0.2.name: wordpress/davids-admin-post-control
1.0.2.description: This is a pretty simple plugin. I wrote it because I have thousands of posts on my blog and I often have twenty or more posts scheduled to be posted. WordPress defaults to only showing you the latest fifteen (15) posts on the "Posts" list page. Now you can change this so you can view up to 9,999 posts per page. (Although I don't recommend showing more than a few hundred at a time.)
